title: CyberTip Triage — 90-Second Investigator Demo
description: A concise walkthrough of CyberTip Triage for ICAC task forces, demonstrating AI-powered prioritization, Wilson compliance automation, and warrant workflow integration.
target_audience: ICAC investigators and supervisors evaluating triage automation tools

cues.narration: Your task force received twelve hundred NeCMEC tips last quarter. Most were triaged by hand. CyberTip Triage changes that.
cues.caption: CyberTip Triage — Investigator Dashboard

cues.narration: The dashboard surfaces what matters first. These stat cards show total tips, open warrants, and blocked files at a glance.
cues.caption: Real-time operational metrics

cues.narration: Every incoming tip is scored by AI and assigned a priority tier — from Immediate down to Monitor.
Filter to Immediate tier. These are tips where victim crisis indicators were detected automatically.
cues.caption: Victim crisis detection

cues.narration: Select the top tip. The detail pane loads the full NeCMEC report, AI analysis, and legal guidance.
Notice the tier badge — P1 Critical. The system flagged an active minor based on language analysis and metadata.
Now, Wilson compliance. The ESP did not view these files, so the system automatically blocks investigator access.
cues.caption: Fourth Amendment — Wilson v. Ewing protection

cues.narration: Blocked files are clearly marked. No investigator can open them without a warrant — zero ambiguity.
One click initiates the warrant workflow. Mark the application as filed, and the system tracks it through approval.
cues.caption: Warrant applied — tracking begins

cues.narration: Scroll down to the legal note. Circuit-specific guidance is generated for each tip based on your jurisdiction.
The legal analysis cites relevant case law so your affidavits start with a foundation, not a blank page.
When a viral image generates dozens of duplicate tips, bundle deduplication collapses them into one investigation.
cues.caption: CLU cluster detection — viral dedup

cues.narration: Supervisors get their own view for workload management, audit trails, and compliance reporting across the task force.
cues.caption: Supervisor admin panel

cues.narration: CyberTip Triage. Fewer missed children. Defensible cases. Every time.
cues.caption: CyberTip Triage — Built for ICAC
